He is best known for his poem collection “Kalahandi” which won Sahitya Akademi Golden Jubilee Award. His poetry has been included in the English literature syllabus of several colleges and universities. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian poets Category:Indian activists Category:Translators
